name: Fellow of The Sublime Society of Beef Steaks
description: Brawlers believe the application of might and a good beef steak is the universal truth. Words have no power and can no more define the universe than they can build a house, lift a cup, or sear a steak. Might can! Really, they have thought a lot about this.

possessions.name: Bottle of Strong but Fancy Wine

special: Choose weapon type when creating character - gain 2 points in that Fighting skill
